metadata.title: CVE-2024-57872 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: ufs: pltfrm: Dellocate HBA during ufshcd_pltfrm_remove()This will ensure that the scsi host is cleaned up properly usingscsi_host_dev_release(). Otherwise, it may lead to memory leaks.
